plot: After finding out that her fiancee Andrew is a three-timer, Sky and her friend Angie decide it is payback time and have Andrew kidnapped. But when the kidnapper delivers his package the two women are in for a surprise...
title: Two Oranges and a Lemon
plot_es: After finding out that her fiancee Andrew is a three-timer, Sky and her friend Angie decide it is payback time and have Andrew kidnapped. But when the kidnapper delivers his package the two women are in for a surprise...
plot_en: After finding out that her fiancee Andrew is a three-timer, Sky and her friend Angie decide it is payback time and have Andrew kidnapped. But when the kidnapper delivers his package the two women are in for a surprise...
